member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Configuration.BannouJson
member.summary:
Static helper for JSON serialization/deserialization that always uses Bannou's standard configuration. This is the SINGLE SOURCE OF TRUTH for JSON serialization settings across all Bannou services and SDKs.
USE THIS INSTEAD OF JsonSerializer.Deserialize/Serialize DIRECTLY.
This ensures consistent behavior across the codebase: - Case-insensitive property matching (handles both PascalCase and camelCase) - Enums serialize as strings matching C# enum names (e.g., "GettingStarted") - Null values are ignored when writing - Strict number handling (no string-to-number coercion) - Proper handling of all Bannou model types
Example usage: var model = BannouJson.Deserialize<MyModel>(jsonString); var json = BannouJson.Serialize(model);

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Configuration.BannouJson.Options
member.summary: Standard JSON serializer options used throughout Bannou. This is the canonical configuration - all JSON operations should use this.

member.summary: Deserialize JSON string to object using Bannou's standard configuration.

member.summary: Deserialize JSON string to object using Bannou's standard configuration. Throws if result is null.

member.summary: Serialize object to JSON string using Bannou's standard configuration.

member.summary: Serialize object to JSON string using Bannou's standard configuration with explicit type.

member.summary: Deserialize from UTF-8 bytes using Bannou's standard configuration.

member.summary: Serialize object to UTF-8 bytes using Bannou's standard configuration.

member.summary: Async deserialize from stream using Bannou's standard configuration.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.IBannouEvent
member.summary: Base interface for all Bannou events (both service-to-service and client events). All events in the system implement this interface, enabling uniform handling in message taps and event processing pipelines.

remarks.para: This interface defines the minimal contract for all events: - EventId: Unique identifier for deduplication and tracing - Timestamp: When the event was created

member.summary: Unique identifier for this event instance (as string). Used for deduplication, tracing, and correlation.

member.summary: When the event was created (UTC).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.IBannouEvent.EventName
member.summary: The type/name of the event- usually also the topic it's published on.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.BaseServiceEvent
member.summary: Base class for all service-to-service events via RabbitMQ pub/sub. All service events MUST inherit from this class and include these fields.

remarks.para: This class is the single source of truth for base service event properties. It is excluded from NSwag generation (like ApiException) to avoid duplicate definitions. All derived events generated via NSwag will inherit from this class.
Implements IBannouEvent for uniform event handling in message taps.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.FullServiceMappingsEvent
member.summary:
Published periodically by Orchestrator as the authoritative source of truth
for all service-to-app-id mappings across the entire network.
Consumed by all bannou instances to atomically update their routing tables.
Published every 30 seconds AND immediately when routing changes.

member.summary: Fixed event type identifier

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.FullServiceMappingsEvent.Mappings
member.summary: Complete dictionary of serviceName -> appId mappings

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.FullServiceMappingsEvent.DefaultAppId
member.summary: Default app-id for unmapped services (usually "bannou")

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.FullServiceMappingsEvent.Version
member.summary: Monotonically increasing version for ordering. Consumers reject events with version <= current.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.FullServiceMappingsEvent.SourceInstanceId
member.summary: Orchestrator instance GUID that published this event

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.FullServiceMappingsEvent.TotalServices
member.summary: Total number of services in the mappings dictionary

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionConnectedEvent
member.summary:
Published by Connect service when a WebSocket connection is fully established.
This event ensures the RabbitMQ exchange exists before any service publishes
to the session-specific topic (CONNECT_SESSION_{sessionId}).
Permissions service uses this to track activeConnections and compile capabilities.
The roles and authorizations enable event-driven capability compilation without
synchronous API calls from Connect to Permissions.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionConnectedEvent.EventName
member.summary: Fixed event type identifier

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionConnectedEvent.SessionId
member.summary: Session ID that just connected via WebSocket

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionConnectedEvent.AccountId
member.summary: Account ID owning the session

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionConnectedEvent.Roles
member.summary: User roles from JWT (e.g., ["user", "admin"]). Used by Permissions to compile capabilities.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionConnectedEvent.Authorizations
member.summary: Authorization states from JWT (e.g., ["arcadia:authorized"]). Format is "serviceId:state".

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionConnectedEvent.ConnectInstanceId
member.summary: Connect service instance handling this connection (for debugging)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionConnectedEvent.ClientInfo
member.summary: Optional client metadata (version, platform, etc.)

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionDisconnectedEvent
member.summary:
Published by Connect service when a WebSocket connection is closed.
Used by Permissions service to remove session from activeConnections.
Also enables cleanup of session-specific resources across services.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionDisconnectedEvent.EventName
member.summary: Fixed event type identifier

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionDisconnectedEvent.SessionId
member.summary: Session ID that disconnected

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionDisconnectedEvent.AccountId
member.summary: Account ID that was disconnected

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionDisconnectedEvent.Reason
member.summary: Disconnect reason (logout, timeout, error, server_shutdown)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionDisconnectedEvent.Reconnectable
member.summary: Whether session can reconnect within the reconnection window

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionDisconnectedEvent.DurationSeconds
member.summary: How long the session was connected (for metrics)

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionReconnectedEvent
member.summary:
Published by Connect service when a WebSocket session is restored after reconnection.
Services should subscribe to this event to re-publish any session shortcuts they
previously granted, as shortcuts are cleared on disconnect and do not persist.
**Session Shortcuts Re-publication:**
Services that publish session shortcuts should listen for this event and re-evaluate
whether the session should receive shortcuts again (e.g., check subscription status,
game state, etc.) and publish new ShortcutPublishedEvents as appropriate.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionReconnectedEvent.EventName
member.summary: Fixed event type identifier

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionReconnectedEvent.SessionId
member.summary: Session ID that reconnected

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionReconnectedEvent.AccountId
member.summary: Account ID owning the reconnected session

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionReconnectedEvent.Roles
member.summary: User roles preserved from previous session

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionReconnectedEvent.Authorizations
member.summary: Authorization states preserved from previous session

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionReconnectedEvent.PreviousDisconnectAt
member.summary: When the previous connection was lost

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionReconnectedEvent.ReconnectionContext
member.summary: Optional context from the reconnection (client info, etc.)

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.BaseClientEvent
member.summary: Base class for all server-to-client push events delivered via WebSocket. All client events MUST inherit from this class and include these fields. The eventName field is used for whitelist validation in Connect service.

remarks.para: This class is the single source of truth for base client event properties. It is excluded from NSwag generation (like ApiException) to avoid duplicate definitions. All derived events generated via NSwag will inherit from this class.
Implements IBannouEvent for uniform event handling in message taps.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.BaseClientEvent.EventName
P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.BaseClientEvent.EventId
member.summary: Unique identifier for this event instance. Used for deduplication, tracing, and correlation.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.BaseClientEvent.Timestamp
member.summary: When the event was generated (ISO 8601 format, UTC).

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.CapabilityManifestEvent
member.summary:
Sent to client when their available API capabilities change.
Contains the complete list of service GUIDs the client can access.
Delivered on initial connection and when permissions change.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.DisconnectNotificationEvent
member.summary:
Sent to client before WebSocket connection is closed.
If reconnectable, includes a token for session restoration.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.DisconnectNotificationEvent.EventName
member.summary: Fixed event type identifier

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.DisconnectNotificationEvent.ReconnectionToken
member.summary: Token for reconnecting to the same session (valid for 5 minutes)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.DisconnectNotificationEvent.ExpiresAt
member.summary: When the reconnection token expires

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.DisconnectNotificationEvent.Reconnectable
member.summary: Whether this session can be reconnected

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.DisconnectNotificationEvent.Reason
member.summary:
Reason for disconnection:
- graceful_disconnect: Client-initiated or idle timeout
- session_invalidated: Session was revoked (e.g., logout, account deleted)
- server_shutdown: Server is shutting down gracefully
- forced_disconnect: Administrative disconnection

member.summary:
Generic error notification sent to client.
Used for recoverable errors that the client should be aware of.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.SystemErrorEvent.EventName
member.summary: Fixed event type identifier

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.SystemErrorEvent.ErrorCode

member.summary: Human-readable error message

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.SystemErrorEvent.Recoverable

member.summary:
Internal event carrying compiled capabilities from Permissions to Connect.
NOT forwarded to clients - Connect intercepts, generates client-salted GUIDs,
and sends CapabilityManifestEvent to the client.

member.summary: Fixed event type identifier (internal, not forwarded to client)

member.summary: Session ID these capabilities apply to

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.SessionCapabilitiesEvent.Permissions
member.summary: Map of ServiceID -> List of available methods (e.g., "accounts" -> ["POST:/get-account"])

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.SessionCapabilitiesEvent.Reason
member.summary: Why capabilities were sent (e.g., "session_connected", "service_registered", "role_changed")

Generic notification event for system-level messages.
Used for announcements, maintenance notices, etc.

member.summary: Fixed event type identifier

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.ShortcutPublishedEvent
member.summary:
Published by services to create or update a session shortcut.
Sent to CONNECT_SESSION_{sessionId} topic for the specific session.
Connect handles this event internally and does NOT forward to the client.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.ShortcutPublishedEvent.EventName
member.summary: Fixed event type identifier.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.ShortcutPublishedEvent.SessionId
member.summary: Target session for this shortcut.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.ShortcutPublishedEvent.ReplaceExisting
member.summary:
If true and a shortcut with the same routeGuid exists, replace it.
If false and shortcut exists, the event is ignored.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.ShortcutRevokedEvent
member.summary:
Published by services to remove shortcuts.
Sent to CONNECT_SESSION_{sessionId} topic for the specific session.
Supports both single-shortcut revocation (by routeGuid) and
bulk revocation (all shortcuts from a sourceService).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.ShortcutRevokedEvent.EventName
member.summary: Fixed event type identifier.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.ShortcutRevokedEvent.SessionId
member.summary: Target session for revocation.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.ShortcutRevokedEvent.RouteGuid
member.summary:
Specific shortcut to revoke.
If provided, only this shortcut is removed.
Mutually exclusive with revokeByService.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.ShortcutRevokedEvent.RevokeByService
member.summary:
Revoke ALL shortcuts from this source service.
Used when a service needs to clear all its shortcuts.
Mutually exclusive with routeGuid.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.ShortcutRevokedEvent.Reason
member.summary: Optional reason for revocation (for logging/debugging).

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.SessionShortcut
member.summary:
A pre-bound API call that clients can invoke with a single GUID.
The boundPayload is injected by Connect when the shortcut is invoked.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.SessionShortcut.RouteGuid
member.summary:
Client-salted GUID for invoking this shortcut.
Uses UUID version 7 bits to distinguish from service GUIDs (version 5).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.SessionShortcut.TargetGuid
member.summary:
The actual service capability GUID this shortcut invokes.
Must be a valid capability in the client's current capability manifest.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.SessionShortcut.BoundPayload
member.summary:
Pre-serialized JSON payload passed unchanged to the target service.
Connect treats this as opaque bytes - no deserialization or modification.

Machine-readable identifier for this shortcut.

member.summary: Human-readable description of what this shortcut does.

member.summary: The target service for routing.

member.summary: The target HTTP method for routing.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.SessionShortcutMetadata.TargetEndpoint
member.summary: The target endpoint for routing.

Optional TTL for this shortcut.

member.summary: Optional categorization tags for client-side organization.

member.summary: Optional user-friendly name for display in client UIs.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage
member.summary: Represents a complete binary message in the Bannou WebSocket protocol. Request messages use a 31-byte header, response messages use a 16-byte header. Provides zero-copy parsing and serialization for optimal performance.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.HeaderSize
member.summary: Size of the binary header in bytes for request messages.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.ResponseHeaderSize
member.summary: Size of the binary header in bytes for response messages. Response headers are smaller because ServiceGuid is not needed (client correlates via MessageId).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.Flags
member.summary: Message behavior flags

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.Channel
member.summary: Channel for sequential message processing (0-65535, 0 = default)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.SequenceNumber
member.summary: Per-channel sequence number for message ordering

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.ServiceGuid
member.summary: Client-salted service GUID for routing (only used in request messages). For response messages, this is Guid.Empty since routing is not needed.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.MessageId
member.summary: Unique message ID for request/response correlation

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.ResponseCode
member.summary: Response code for response messages (0 = OK, non-zero = error). Only meaningful when Flags has Response set.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.Payload
member.summary: Message payload (JSON or binary data based on flags). For error responses (non-zero ResponseCode), this is empty.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.#ctor(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.MessageFlags,System.UInt16,System.UInt32,System.Guid,System.UInt64,System.ReadOnlyMemory{System.Byte})
member.summary: Initializes a new binary message with the specified parameters (for requests).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.#ctor(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.MessageFlags,System.UInt16,System.UInt32,System.UInt64,System.Byte,System.ReadOnlyMemory{System.Byte})
member.summary: Initializes a new binary message with the specified parameters (for responses).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.FromJson(System.UInt16,System.UInt32,System.Guid,System.UInt64,System.String,BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.MessageFlags)
member.summary: Creates a binary message from a JSON string payload.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.FromBinary(System.UInt16,System.UInt32,System.Guid,System.UInt64,System.ReadOnlyMemory{System.Byte},BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.MessageFlags)
member.summary: Creates a binary message from raw binary payload.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.CreateResponse(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage,BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ResponseCodes,System.ReadOnlyMemory{System.Byte})
member.summary: Creates a response message for the given request. For error responses (non-zero responseCode), the payload should be empty. For success responses (responseCode = 0), the payload contains the response data.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.GetJsonPayload
member.summary: Gets the JSON payload as a string (if the message is JSON).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.Parse(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Parses a binary message from a byte array. Automatically detects whether this is a request (31-byte header) or response (16-byte header).
member.param: Buffer containing the complete message
Total length of the message

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.ToByteArray
member.summary: Serializes the binary message to a byte array. Uses 31-byte header for requests, 16-byte header for responses.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.ExpectsResponse
member.summary: Returns true if this message expects a response.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.IsResponse
member.summary: Returns true if this message is a response to another message.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.IsClientRouted
member.summary: Returns true if this message should be routed to a client (not a service).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.IsHighPriority
member.summary: Returns true if this message has high priority.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.IsSuccess
member.summary: Returns true if this is a successful response (ResponseCode is 0). Only meaningful for response messages.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.IsError
member.summary: Returns true if this is an error response (ResponseCode is non-zero). Only meaningful for response messages.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.IsMeta
member.summary: Returns true if this message requests endpoint metadata instead of executing the endpoint. When set, the Channel field specifies the meta type: 0 = endpoint-info, 1 = request-schema, 2 = response-schema, 3 = full-schema.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string representation of the message for debugging.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.MessageFlags
member.summary: Bit flags controlling message behavior in the enhanced 31-byte binary protocol. These flags provide zero-copy routing and performance optimizations.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.MessageFlags.None
member.summary: Default - JSON text, service request, unencrypted, standard priority, expects response

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.MessageFlags.Binary
member.summary: Message payload is binary data (not JSON)

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.MessageFlags.Encrypted
member.summary: Message payload is encrypted

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.MessageFlags.Compressed
member.summary: Message payload is compressed (gzip)

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.MessageFlags.HighPriority
member.summary: Deliver at high priority, skip to front of queues

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.MessageFlags.Event
member.summary: Fire-and-forget message, no response expected

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.MessageFlags.Client
member.summary: Route to another WebSocket client (not a Bannou service)

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.MessageFlags.Response
member.summary: Message is a response to an RPC (not a new request)

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.MessageFlags.Meta
member.summary: Request metadata about endpoint instead of executing it. When set, the Channel field specifies the meta type: 0 = endpoint-info, 1 = request-schema, 2 = response-schema, 3 = full-schema. Connect service transforms the path and routes to companion endpoints.

member.summary: Network byte order utilities for cross-platform binary protocol compatibility. Ensures consistent endianness across all client and server implementations.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.GuidGenerator
member.summary: Dependency-free GUID generation utilities for client-server security. Provides client-salted GUIDs to prevent cross-session exploitation.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.GuidGenerator.GenerateServiceGuid(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Generates a client-salted GUID for a service endpoint. Each client gets unique GUIDs for identical services, preventing security exploits.
member.param: Unique session identifier
Name of the target service
Server-generated salt for additional security
Optional additional entropy for specialized use cases
member.returns: Deterministic but unique GUID for this session-service combination

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.GuidGenerator.GenerateClientGuid(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Generates a client-to-client routing GUID for P2P communication.
member.param: Source client session ID
Target client session ID
Server salt for security

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.GuidGenerator.GenerateSessionShortcutGuid(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Generates a client-salted GUID for a session shortcut. Uses UUID version 7 bits to distinguish from service GUIDs (version 5) and client-to-client GUIDs (version 6).
member.param: Unique session identifier
Machine-readable name for this shortcut
Service that created this shortcut
Server-generated salt for additional security
member.returns: Deterministic but unique GUID for this session-shortcut combination

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.GuidGenerator.IsSessionShortcutGuid(System.Guid)
member.summary: Validates that a GUID is a session shortcut GUID (version 7). Useful for detecting shortcut GUIDs vs service GUIDs (v5) or client GUIDs (v6).
member.param: GUID to validate
member.returns: True if the GUID has version 7 bits set (session shortcut)

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.GuidGenerator.IsServiceGuid(System.Guid)
member.summary: Validates that a GUID is a service GUID (version 5).
member.param: GUID to validate
member.returns: True if the GUID has version 5 bits set (service capability)

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.GuidGenerator.IsClientGuid(System.Guid)
member.summary: Validates that a GUID is a client-to-client GUID (version 6).
member.param: GUID to validate
member.returns: True if the GUID has version 6 bits set (client-to-client routing)

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.GuidGenerator.GenerateMessageId
member.summary: Generates a unique message ID for request/response correlation. Uses timestamp and entropy for uniqueness.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.GuidGenerator.ValidateServiceGuid(System.Guid,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Validates that a GUID was generated by this system. Useful for detecting tampered or externally-generated GUIDs.
member.param: GUID to validate
Session ID that should have generated this GUID
Service name that should match
Server salt used in generation
member.returns: True if the GUID is valid for these parameters

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.GuidGenerator.GenerateServerSalt
member.summary: Creates a server salt with cryptographic randomness. Should be generated once per server instance and reused.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.IConnectClient.ProxyInternalRequestAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.InternalProxyRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Internal API proxy for stateless requests
member.remarks:
Stateless HTTP proxy for internal requests that don't require persistent sessions.
Applies permission validation and rate limiting based on agent role and context.
Perfect for AI agents making one-off API calls or bulk operations.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.IConnectClient.GetClientCapabilitiesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.GetClientCapabilitiesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get client capability manifest (GUID API mappings)
member.remarks:
Returns the capability manifest for the authenticated client's session.
Maps client-salted GUIDs to available API endpoints based on the client's
current permissions and session state.
**Security**: Each client receives unique GUIDs for the same API endpoints.
This prevents cross-session exploitation and enables per-client rate limiting.
**Dynamic Updates**: Capabilities may change during a session when:
- Role changes occur (admin promotion, etc.)
- Subscription status changes
- Session state transitions
Clients should listen for capability update events via WebSocket to stay current.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.IConnectClient.ConnectWebSocketAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Connection,BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Upgrade,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Establish WebSocket connection
member.remarks:
Initiates a WebSocket connection for real-time communication.
Requires JWT authentication via Authorization header.
**Connection Flow:**
1. Send HTTP GET request with `Connection: Upgrade` and `Upgrade: websocket` headers
2. Include `Authorization: Bearer <jwt_token>` header for authentication
3. Server validates JWT and extracts user claims (roles, scopes, services)
4. Connection upgrades to WebSocket protocol
5. Client can send binary messages using the custom protocol
**Reconnection:**
For existing sessions, use `Authorization: Reconnect <reconnect_token>` instead.
member.param: Must be "Upgrade" to initiate WebSocket connection
Must be "websocket" to specify protocol upgrade

JWT Bearer token for new connections: "Bearer <jwt_token>"
Reconnect token for existing sessions: "Reconnect <reconnect_token>"

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.IConnectClient.ConnectWebSocketPostAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Connection2,BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Upgrade2,System.String,BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ConnectRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Establish WebSocket connection (POST variant)
member.remarks:
Alternative POST method for establishing WebSocket connections.
Functionally identical to the GET method but supports clients that
require POST for WebSocket upgrades.
member.param: Optional connection parameters

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ResponseCodes
member.summary:
Response codes used in the binary protocol for success/error indication.
Provides fine-grained error reporting for different failure scenarios.
**Shortcut-specific error codes (70-79):**
- 70 (ShortcutExpired): Session shortcut has expired (TTL exceeded)
- 71 (ShortcutTargetNotFound): Shortcut's target capability no longer available
- 72 (ShortcutRevoked): Session shortcut was explicitly revoked

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ServiceRequestMessage
member.summary:
Structure of a service request message in the enhanced 31-byte binary protocol.
This schema is for documentation - actual messages are binary.
**Binary Header Layout (31 bytes):**
- Bytes 0: Message Flags (1 byte)
- Bytes 1-2: Channel ID (2 bytes, big-endian)
- Bytes 3-6: Sequence Number (4 bytes, big-endian)
- Bytes 7-22: Service GUID (16 bytes)
- Bytes 23-30: Message ID (8 bytes)
- Bytes 31+: Payload (variable length)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ServiceRequestMessage.Channel
member.summary: Channel for sequential message processing (0-65535, 0 = default)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ServiceRequestMessage.SequenceNumber
member.summary: Per-channel sequence number for message ordering

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ServiceRequestMessage.ServiceGuid
member.summary: Client-salted service GUID for routing

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ServiceRequestMessage.MessageId
member.summary: Unique message ID for request/response correlation

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ServiceRequestMessage.Payload
member.summary: Message payload (JSON or binary data based on flags)

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ServiceResponseMessage
member.summary:
Structure of a service response message in the enhanced 31-byte binary protocol.
This schema is for documentation - actual messages are binary.
**Binary Header Layout (31 bytes):**
- Same as ServiceRequestMessage but with Response flag (0x40) set

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.GameSession.VoiceConnectionInfo
member.summary:
Minimal voice metadata returned when joining a session.
**Event-Only Pattern**: Peer connection details are NOT included here.
Clients receive VoicePeerJoinedEvent when other peers join (with their SDP offers).
This avoids race conditions between response processing and event handling.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.RelationshipType.IRelationshipTypeClient.MatchesHierarchyAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.RelationshipType.MatchesHierarchyRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Check if type matches ancestor in hierarchy
member.remarks:
Checks if a relationship type matches or descends from an ancestor type.
For example, "SON" matches "CHILD" because CHILD is an ancestor of SON.
This enables queries like "find all CHILD relationships" to match SON, DAUGHTER, etc.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.RelationshipType.IRelationshipTypeClient.GetAncestorsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.RelationshipType.GetAncestorsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get all ancestors of a relationship type
member.remarks:
Returns the full ancestry chain from the specified type up to the root.
For example, for "SON" might return ["CHILD", "FAMILY"].

member.summary: Update relationship type

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.RelationshipType.IRelationshipTypeClient.DeleteRelationshipTypeAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.RelationshipType.DeleteRelationshipTypeRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Delete relationship type
member.remarks:
Hard delete a relationship type. This will fail if the type is still in use.
For safe removal, first deprecate the type, then merge it into another type
(or VOID), then delete. Only deprecated types with zero references can be deleted.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.RelationshipType.IRelationshipTypeClient.DeprecateRelationshipTypeAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.RelationshipType.DeprecateRelationshipTypeRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Deprecate a relationship type
member.remarks:
Soft-delete a relationship type by marking it as deprecated.
Deprecated types:
- Remain queryable for historical data
- Cannot be used for creating new relationships
- Can be merged into other types using the merge endpoint
- Can be hard-deleted after all references are removed

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.RelationshipType.IRelationshipTypeClient.UndeprecateRelationshipTypeAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.RelationshipType.UndeprecateRelationshipTypeRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Restore a deprecated relationship type
member.remarks:
Remove the deprecated status from a relationship type, making it
available for new relationships again.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.RelationshipType.IRelationshipTypeClient.MergeRelationshipTypeAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.RelationshipType.MergeRelationshipTypeRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Merge a deprecated type into another type
member.remarks:
Migrate all relationships using a deprecated type to a target type.
This is the recommended way to handle type removal:
1. Deprecate the source type
2. Merge into the target type (or VOID for effective deletion)
3. Optionally hard-delete the now-empty deprecated type
The merge operation:
- Updates all relationships using sourceTypeId to use targetTypeId
- Publishes events for each affected relationship
- Returns count of migrated relationships
- Fails if source is not deprecated (safety check)

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.RelationshipType.IRelationshipTypeClient.SeedRelationshipTypesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.RelationshipType.SeedRelationshipTypesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Seed relationship types from configuration
member.remarks:
Idempotent operation to seed relationship types from provided data.
Creates types that don't exist, optionally updates existing types.
Typically called at service startup with YAML-defined types.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mesh.IMeshClient.GetEndpointsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mesh.GetEndpointsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get endpoints for a service
member.remarks:
Returns all healthy endpoints for the specified app-id.
Used by IMeshClient to resolve target hosts for service invocation.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mesh.IMeshClient.ListEndpointsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mesh.ListEndpointsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: List all registered endpoints
member.remarks:
Returns all registered service endpoints across all app-ids.
Admin-only endpoint for monitoring and debugging.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mesh.IMeshClient.RegisterEndpointAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mesh.RegisterEndpointRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Register a service endpoint
member.remarks:
Registers this instance's endpoint in the service mesh.
Called during service startup to announce availability.
Endpoint TTL is refreshed on each heartbeat.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mesh.IMeshClient.DeregisterEndpointAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mesh.DeregisterEndpointRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Deregister a service endpoint
member.remarks:
Removes this instance's endpoint from the service mesh.
Called during graceful shutdown.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mesh.IMeshClient.HeartbeatAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mesh.HeartbeatRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Update endpoint health and load
member.remarks:
Refreshes endpoint TTL and updates health/load metrics.
Should be called periodically (default: every 30 seconds).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mesh.IMeshClient.GetRouteAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mesh.GetRouteRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get optimal endpoint for routing
member.remarks:
Returns a single endpoint for the specified app-id, selected by the
configured load balancing algorithm (round-robin, least-connections, weighted).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mesh.IMeshClient.GetMappingsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mesh.GetMappingsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get service-to-app-id mappings
member.remarks:
Returns the current service name to app-id mapping table.
Used by ServiceAppMappingResolver for distributed deployment.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mesh.IMeshClient.GetHealthAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mesh.GetHealthRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get mesh health status
member.remarks:
Returns overall health of the service mesh including:
- Total registered endpoints
- Healthy/degraded/unavailable counts
- Redis connectivity status

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Permissions.IPermissionsClient.GetRegisteredServicesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Permissions.ListServicesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: List all registered services
member.remarks:
Returns list of all services that have registered their permissions.
This endpoint is used by testers to wait for service readiness - a service
appearing in this list means it has completed startup and registered its
API permissions, indicating it's ready to handle requests.
For service-to-service calls (via mesh), this endpoint is unrestricted.
For client calls through WebSocket/Connect, only admin users can access it.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Relationship.EntityType
member.summary:
Type of entity in a relationship.
- CHARACTER: Player-controlled characters
- NPC: Non-player characters
- MONSTER: Hostile or neutral creatures
- ITEM: Physical objects, artifacts, etc.
- LOCATION: Places, regions, buildings
- ORGANIZATION: Guilds, companies, groups
- FACTION: Political or social factions
- REALM: Game realms/worlds
- OTHER: Catch-all for future entity types

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.RestartServiceAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ServiceRestartRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Restart service with optional configuration
member.remarks:
Performs intelligent service restart based on health metrics.
Only restarts if truly necessary (e.g., 5+ minute degradation).
Supports optional environment variable updates during restart.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.ShouldRestartServiceAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ShouldRestartServiceRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Check if service needs restart
member.remarks:
Evaluates service health and determines if restart is necessary.
Restart logic:
- Healthy: No restart needed
- Degraded < 5 min: No restart needed
- Degraded > 5 min: Restart recommended
- Unavailable: Restart needed

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.GetBackendsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ListBackendsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Detect available container orchestration backends
member.remarks:
Detects which container orchestration backends are available on this system.
Returns availability status and capabilities for each backend.
**Priority Order** (for automatic selection):
1. Kubernetes - Full cluster orchestration with operators
2. Portainer - API abstraction over Compose/Swarm with web UI
3. Docker Swarm - Native Docker cluster orchestration
4. Docker Compose - Single-host container management
Detection methods:
- Kubernetes: Check for kubectl and cluster connectivity
- Portainer: Check for Portainer API endpoint
- Swarm: Check `docker info` for swarm mode
- Compose: Check for docker compose v2 availability

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.GetPresetsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ListPresetsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: List available deployment presets
member.remarks:
Returns all available deployment presets from the orchestrator's preset directory.
Presets define service combinations and configuration for specific use cases.
Built-in presets:
- `local-development`: All services in single container with mesh infrastructure
- `local-testing`: Test environment with infrastructure services
- `integration-http`: HTTP integration testing preset
- `integration-edge`: WebSocket/edge testing preset
- `split-auth-accounts`: Auth and Accounts in separate containers
- `distributed-npc`: NPC processing distributed across nodes

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.DeployAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.DeployRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Deploy or update an environment
member.remarks:
Deploys a complete environment using a preset or custom configuration.
Supports graceful transitions, forced deployments, and clean rebuilds.
**Deployment Modes**:
- `graceful`: Wait for existing connections to drain before changing topology
- `force`: Immediately apply changes (may interrupt active connections)
- `clean`: Tear down completely and rebuild from scratch
**Backend Selection**:
- If `backend` not specified, uses highest-priority available backend
- If `backend` specified but unavailable, returns error (no fallback)
**Live Topology Changes**:
Supports changing service distribution without full restart:
- Move auth/accounts to separate container while keeping other services together
- Scale specific services to additional nodes
- Update environment variables without restart (where supported)

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.GetServiceRoutingAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.GetServiceRoutingRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get current service-to-app-id routing mappings
member.remarks:
Returns the current service-to-app-id routing mappings used for mesh service invocation through lib-mesh.
This is the authoritative source of truth for how services are routed in the current deployment.
In development, all services route to "bannou" by default. In production, services may be
distributed across multiple app-ids based on deployment topology.
**Use Cases**:
- Services querying routing on startup
- Debugging service communication issues
- Monitoring deployment topology

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.GetStatusAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.GetStatusRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get current environment status
member.remarks:
Returns comprehensive status of the current deployment including:
- Active backend and deployment configuration
- Service topology (which services on which containers)
- Container health and resource usage
- Infrastructure component status
- Active preset and any customizations

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.TeardownAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.TeardownRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Tear down the current environment
member.remarks:
Tears down all containers and services in the current deployment.
Optionally preserves volumes and networks for faster redeployment.
**Teardown Modes**:
- `graceful`: Signal shutdown and wait for clean exit
- `force`: Immediately stop all containers (SIGKILL)
- `preserve-data`: Keep volumes and networks, only remove containers

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.CleanAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.CleanRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Clean up unused resources
member.remarks:
Prunes unused Docker resources to reclaim disk space and clean up
orphaned containers, networks, volumes, and images.
Equivalent to running various `docker system prune` commands.
**Clean Targets**:
- `containers`: Remove stopped containers
- `networks`: Remove unused networks
- `volumes`: Remove unused volumes (CAUTION: data loss)
- `images`: Remove dangling images
- `all`: All of the above

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.GetLogsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.GetLogsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get service/container logs
member.remarks:
Retrieves logs from services or containers with filtering options.
Supports real-time streaming via WebSocket upgrade.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.UpdateTopologyAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.TopologyUpdateRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Update service topology without full redeploy
member.remarks:
Changes which services run on which containers without tearing down
the entire environment. Enables live topology changes.
**Use Cases**:
- Move auth service to dedicated container for scaling
- Consolidate services during low-traffic periods
- Split services for debugging/isolation
- Add new service nodes to running environment

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.RequestContainerRestartAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ContainerRestartRequestBody,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Request container restart (self-service pattern)
member.remarks:
Plugins call this endpoint to request restart of their own container.
This is part of the self-service configuration update pattern where
plugins decide if they care about config changes and request restarts.
**Flow**:
1. Orchestrator publishes ConfigurationChangedEvent with changed keys
2. Plugins check if any changed keys match their dependencies
3. Plugins that care call this endpoint to request restart
4. Orchestrator performs rolling restart of requested containers
**Priority Levels**:
- `graceful`: Rolling update, wait for healthy before cycling next instance
- `immediate`: Rolling update but don't wait for connection drain
- `force`: Kill all instances simultaneously (causes downtime)

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.GetContainerStatusAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.GetContainerStatusRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get container health and restart history
member.remarks:
Returns detailed status of a container including health, restart history,
running plugins, and current configuration.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.RollbackConfigurationAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ConfigRollbackRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Rollback to previous configuration
member.remarks:
Quickly rollback to the previous configuration without waiting for CI.
Swaps currentConfig with previousConfig and publishes ConfigurationChangedEvent
with the reverted keys so services can request restart.
**Note**: This is a quick fix. GitHub secrets should still be corrected
to prevent re-breaking on next orchestrator deploy.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.GetConfigVersionAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.GetConfigVersionRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get current configuration version and metadata
member.remarks:
Returns the current configuration version, last update time,
and summary of configuration state (not actual values for security).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.AcquireProcessorAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.AcquireProcessorRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Acquire a processor from a pool
member.remarks:
Requests an available processor instance from the specified pool type.
Returns the app-id of an available processor or 429 if none available.
The processor is marked as busy until explicitly released.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.ReleaseProcessorAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ReleaseProcessorRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Release a processor back to the pool
member.remarks:
Releases a previously acquired processor, making it available for other requests.
Should be called when processing is complete or on error cleanup.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.GetPoolStatusAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.GetPoolStatusRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get processing pool status
member.remarks:
Returns current status of a processing pool including:
- Total instances (running and available)
- Current utilization
- Queue depth (waiting requests)
- Recent processing metrics

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.ScalePoolAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ScalePoolRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Scale a processing pool
member.remarks:
Manually adjust the size of a processing pool.
Can scale up (add instances) or scale down (remove idle instances).
Respects min/max constraints from pool configuration.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.CleanupPoolAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.CleanupPoolRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Cleanup idle processing pool instances
member.remarks:
Scales pool back to minimum instances by removing idle processors.
Used for resource reclamation during low-activity periods.

- Healthy: No restart needed
- Degraded < 5 min: No restart needed
- Degraded > 5 min: Restart recommended
- Unavailable: Restart needed

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.OrchestratorClient.GetBackendsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ListBackendsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Detect available container orchestration backends
member.remarks:
Detects which container orchestration backends are available on this system.
Returns availability status and capabilities for each backend.
**Priority Order** (for automatic selection):
1. Kubernetes - Full cluster orchestration with operators
2. Portainer - API abstraction over Compose/Swarm with web UI
3. Docker Swarm - Native Docker cluster orchestration
4. Docker Compose - Single-host container management
Detection methods:
- Kubernetes: Check for kubectl and cluster connectivity
- Portainer: Check for Portainer API endpoint
- Swarm: Check `docker info` for swarm mode
- Compose: Check for docker compose v2 availability

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.OrchestratorClient.GetPresetsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ListPresetsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: List available deployment presets
member.remarks:
Returns all available deployment presets from the orchestrator's preset directory.
Presets define service combinations and configuration for specific use cases.
Built-in presets:
- `local-development`: All services in single container with mesh infrastructure
- `local-testing`: Test environment with infrastructure services
- `integration-http`: HTTP integration testing preset
- `integration-edge`: WebSocket/edge testing preset
- `split-auth-accounts`: Auth and Accounts in separate containers
- `distributed-npc`: NPC processing distributed across nodes

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.OrchestratorClient.DeployAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.DeployRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Deploy or update an environment
member.remarks:
Deploys a complete environment using a preset or custom configuration.
Supports graceful transitions, forced deployments, and clean rebuilds.
**Deployment Modes**:
- `graceful`: Wait for existing connections to drain before changing topology
- `force`: Immediately apply changes (may interrupt active connections)
- `clean`: Tear down completely and rebuild from scratch
**Backend Selection**:
- If `backend` not specified, uses highest-priority available backend
- If `backend` specified but unavailable, returns error (no fallback)
**Live Topology Changes**:
Supports changing service distribution without full restart:
- Move auth/accounts to separate container while keeping other services together
- Scale specific services to additional nodes
- Update environment variables without restart (where supported)

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.OrchestratorClient.GetServiceRoutingAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.GetServiceRoutingRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get current service-to-app-id routing mappings
member.remarks:
Returns the current service-to-app-id routing mappings used for mesh service invocation through lib-mesh.
This is the authoritative source of truth for how services are routed in the current deployment.
In development, all services route to "bannou" by default. In production, services may be
distributed across multiple app-ids based on deployment topology.
**Use Cases**:
- Services querying routing on startup
- Debugging service communication issues
- Monitoring deployment topology

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.OrchestratorClient.GetStatusAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.GetStatusRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get current environment status
member.remarks:
Returns comprehensive status of the current deployment including:
- Active backend and deployment configuration
- Service topology (which services on which containers)
- Container health and resource usage
- Infrastructure component status
- Active preset and any customizations

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.OrchestratorClient.TeardownAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.TeardownRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Tear down the current environment
member.remarks:
Tears down all containers and services in the current deployment.
Optionally preserves volumes and networks for faster redeployment.
**Teardown Modes**:
- `graceful`: Signal shutdown and wait for clean exit
- `force`: Immediately stop all containers (SIGKILL)
- `preserve-data`: Keep volumes and networks, only remove containers

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.OrchestratorClient.CleanAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.CleanRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Clean up unused resources
member.remarks:
Prunes unused Docker resources to reclaim disk space and clean up
orphaned containers, networks, volumes, and images.
Equivalent to running various `docker system prune` commands.
**Clean Targets**:
- `containers`: Remove stopped containers
- `networks`: Remove unused networks
- `volumes`: Remove unused volumes (CAUTION: data loss)
- `images`: Remove dangling images
- `all`: All of the above

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.OrchestratorClient.GetLogsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.GetLogsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get service/container logs
member.remarks:
Retrieves logs from services or containers with filtering options.
Supports real-time streaming via WebSocket upgrade.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.OrchestratorClient.UpdateTopologyAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.TopologyUpdateRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Update service topology without full redeploy
member.remarks:
Changes which services run on which containers without tearing down
the entire environment. Enables live topology changes.
**Use Cases**:
- Move auth service to dedicated container for scaling
- Consolidate services during low-traffic periods
- Split services for debugging/isolation
- Add new service nodes to running environment

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.OrchestratorClient.RequestContainerRestartAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ContainerRestartRequestBody,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Request container restart (self-service pattern)
member.remarks:
Plugins call this endpoint to request restart of their own container.
This is part of the self-service configuration update pattern where
plugins decide if they care about config changes and request restarts.
**Flow**:
1. Orchestrator publishes ConfigurationChangedEvent with changed keys
2. Plugins check if any changed keys match their dependencies
3. Plugins that care call this endpoint to request restart
4. Orchestrator performs rolling restart of requested containers
**Priority Levels**:
- `graceful`: Rolling update, wait for healthy before cycling next instance
- `immediate`: Rolling update but don't wait for connection drain
- `force`: Kill all instances simultaneously (causes downtime)

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.OrchestratorClient.GetContainerStatusAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.GetContainerStatusRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get container health and restart history
member.remarks:
Returns detailed status of a container including health, restart history,
running plugins, and current configuration.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.OrchestratorClient.RollbackConfigurationAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ConfigRollbackRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Rollback to previous configuration
member.remarks:
Quickly rollback to the previous configuration without waiting for CI.
Swaps currentConfig with previousConfig and publishes ConfigurationChangedEvent
with the reverted keys so services can request restart.
**Note**: This is a quick fix. GitHub secrets should still be corrected
to prevent re-breaking on next orchestrator deploy.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.OrchestratorClient.GetConfigVersionAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.GetConfigVersionRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get current configuration version and metadata
member.remarks:
Returns the current configuration version, last update time,
and summary of configuration state (not actual values for security).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.OrchestratorClient.AcquireProcessorAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.AcquireProcessorRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Acquire a processor from a pool
member.remarks:
Requests an available processor instance from the specified pool type.
Returns the app-id of an available processor or 429 if none available.
The processor is marked as busy until explicitly released.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.OrchestratorClient.ReleaseProcessorAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ReleaseProcessorRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Release a processor back to the pool
member.remarks:
Releases a previously acquired processor, making it available for other requests.
Should be called when processing is complete or on error cleanup.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.OrchestratorClient.GetPoolStatusAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.GetPoolStatusRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get processing pool status
member.remarks:
Returns current status of a processing pool including:
- Total instances (running and available)
- Current utilization
- Queue depth (waiting requests)
- Recent processing metrics

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.OrchestratorClient.ScalePoolAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ScalePoolRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Scale a processing pool
member.remarks:
Manually adjust the size of a processing pool.
Can scale up (add instances) or scale down (remove idle instances).
Respects min/max constraints from pool configuration.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.OrchestratorClient.CleanupPoolAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.CleanupPoolRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Cleanup idle processing pool instances
member.remarks:
Scales pool back to minimum instances by removing idle processors.
Used for resource reclamation during low-activity periods.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.TeardownMode
member.summary:
Teardown mode:
- graceful: Signal shutdown, wait for clean exit
- force: Immediately stop (SIGKILL)
- preserve-data: Keep volumes/networks, remove containers

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.TeardownRequest.DryRun
member.summary:
When true, simulates teardown without actually stopping or removing containers.
Returns what would be torn down. ALWAYS use dryRun=true first to preview the impact.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.TeardownRequest.Timeout
member.summary: Graceful shutdown timeout in seconds

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.TeardownRequest.RemoveVolumes
member.summary: Also remove associated volumes

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.TeardownRequest.RemoveNetworks
member.summary: Also remove associated networks

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.TeardownRequest.IncludeInfrastructure
member.summary:
When true, also removes support infrastructure (Redis, RabbitMQ, MySQL, etc.).
This is determined by scanning compose files or finding containers in the same
Docker swarm/Kubernetes namespace as bannou services. USE WITH EXTREME CAUTION -
this will destroy all data and require a full re-deployment.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ConfigurationChangedEvent
member.summary:
Published by orchestrator when configuration or secrets change.
All containers receive this event via RabbitMQ. Plugins decide if they care
based on the changedKeys prefixes and request restart if needed.
Topic: bannou-configuration-events

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ConfigurationChangedEvent.EventId
member.summary: Unique identifier for this event instance

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ConfigurationChangedEvent.ConfigVersion
member.summary: Monotonically increasing version number

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ConfigurationChangedEvent.ChangedKeys
member.summary:
Configuration keys that changed (not values for security).
Key prefixes indicate scope:
- "auth.*" - Authentication-related
- "database.*" - Database connections
- "mesh.*" - Mesh components (typically global impact)
- "connect.*" - WebSocket/connection settings

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.RestartPriority
member.summary:
Restart urgency level:
- graceful: Rolling update, wait for healthy before cycling next instance
- immediate: Rolling update but don't wait for connection drain
- force: Kill all instances simultaneously (causes downtime)

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.IAuthClient.InitOAuthAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.Provider,System.Uri,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Initialize OAuth2 flow (browser redirect)
member.remarks:
Browser-facing endpoint for initiating OAuth flows. The user's browser navigates
to this URL directly, which then redirects to the OAuth provider.
**Note**: This endpoint uses GET with path parameters because it's a browser
redirect flow, not a WebSocket-routed API call.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.IAuthClient.CompleteOAuthAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.Provider,BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.OAuthCallbackRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Complete OAuth2 flow (browser redirect callback)
member.remarks:
Browser-facing callback endpoint for OAuth providers. The OAuth provider redirects
the user's browser back to this URL after authentication.
**Note**: This endpoint uses path parameters because the callback URL is registered
with OAuth providers and cannot be changed without updating provider configurations.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.IAuthClient.VerifySteamAuthAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.SteamVerifyRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Verify Steam Session Ticket
member.remarks:
Validates a Steam Session Ticket obtained from the game client via ISteamUser::GetAuthTicketForWebApi().
The server validates the ticket with Steam's Web API and retrieves the SteamID from Steam's response.
NEVER trust client-provided SteamID - it must come from Steam's authenticated response.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.IAssetClient.RequestUploadAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.UploadRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Request upload URL for a new asset
member.remarks:
Generate a pre-signed URL for uploading a new asset directly to storage.
For large files (>50MB), returns multipart upload configuration.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.IAssetClient.CompleteUploadAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.CompleteUploadRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Mark upload as complete, trigger processing
member.remarks:
Called after the client has uploaded the file to the pre-signed URL.
Triggers the asset processing pipeline (texture conversion, model validation, etc.)
and emits completion events via WebSocket.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.IAssetClient.GetAssetAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.GetAssetRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get asset metadata and download URL
member.remarks:
Retrieve asset metadata and generate a pre-signed download URL.
Specify version to download a specific version, or omit for latest.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.IAssetClient.ListAssetVersionsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.ListVersionsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: List all versions of an asset
member.remarks:
Retrieve version history for an asset with pagination.
Includes version IDs, creation timestamps, and archive status.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.IAssetClient.SearchAssetsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.AssetSearchRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Search assets by tags, type, or realm
member.remarks:
Search assets using various filters with pagination.
All filters are optional and combine with AND logic.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.IAssetClient.CreateBundleAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.CreateBundleRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Create asset bundle from multiple assets
member.remarks:
Create a .bannou bundle containing multiple assets.
For large bundles, processing is delegated to the processing pool.
Completion notification sent via WebSocket event.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.IAssetClient.GetBundleAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.GetBundleRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get bundle manifest and download URL
member.remarks:
Retrieve bundle metadata and generate a pre-signed download URL.
Supports both native .bannou format and ZIP conversion (cached).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.IAssetClient.RequestBundleUploadAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.BundleUploadRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Request upload URL for a pre-made bundle
member.remarks:
Upload a pre-built bundle (.bannou or .zip format).
After upload, the bundle undergoes validation before registration.
