member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.IVoiceClient.CreateVoiceRoomAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.CreateVoiceRoomRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Create voice room for a game session
member.remarks:
Creates a new voice room associated with a game session.
Called by GameSession service when creating a session with voice enabled.
Returns room ID and initial configuration.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.IVoiceClient.GetVoiceRoomAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.GetVoiceRoomRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get voice room details
member.remarks:
Retrieves current state of a voice room including participant list.
Called by GameSession service to check room status.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.IVoiceClient.JoinVoiceRoomAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.JoinVoiceRoomRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Join voice room and register SIP endpoint
member.remarks:
Registers a participant's SIP endpoint with the voice room.
Called by GameSession service when a player joins a session.
Returns connection info and current peer list for P2P mode,
or RTP server details for scaled mode.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.IVoiceClient.LeaveVoiceRoomAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.LeaveVoiceRoomRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Leave voice room
member.remarks:
Removes a participant from the voice room and notifies other peers.
Called by GameSession service when a player leaves a session.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.IVoiceClient.DeleteVoiceRoomAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.DeleteVoiceRoomRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Delete voice room
member.remarks:
Deletes a voice room and notifies all participants.
Called by GameSession service when a session is deleted.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.IVoiceClient.PeerHeartbeatAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.PeerHeartbeatRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Update peer endpoint TTL
member.remarks:
Refreshes the TTL for a participant's endpoint registration.
Should be called periodically to prevent endpoint expiration.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.IVoiceClient.AnswerPeerAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.AnswerPeerRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Send SDP answer to complete WebRTC handshake
member.remarks:
Called by clients after receiving a VoicePeerJoinedEvent containing an SDP offer.
The client generates an SDP answer and sends it via this endpoint.
The answering peer is notified via VoicePeerUpdatedEvent.
**Access Control**: This endpoint requires the `voice:ringing` state, which is
automatically set by the Voice service when a VoicePeerJoinedEvent is sent to the client.
The state is cleared after the answer is processed or times out.

Removes a participant from the voice room and notifies other peers.
Called by GameSession service when a player leaves a session.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.VoiceClient.DeleteVoiceRoomAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.DeleteVoiceRoomRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Delete voice room
member.remarks:
Deletes a voice room and notifies all participants.
Called by GameSession service when a session is deleted.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.VoiceClient.PeerHeartbeatAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.PeerHeartbeatRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Update peer endpoint TTL
member.remarks:
Refreshes the TTL for a participant's endpoint registration.
Should be called periodically to prevent endpoint expiration.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.VoiceClient.AnswerPeerAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.AnswerPeerRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Send SDP answer to complete WebRTC handshake
member.remarks:
Called by clients after receiving a VoicePeerJoinedEvent containing an SDP offer.
The client generates an SDP answer and sends it via this endpoint.
The answering peer is notified via VoicePeerUpdatedEvent.
**Access Control**: This endpoint requires the `voice:ringing` state, which is
automatically set by the Voice service when a VoicePeerJoinedEvent is sent to the client.
The state is cleared after the answer is processed or times out.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.VoiceTier
member.summary:
Voice communication tier:
- p2p: Direct peer-to-peer connections (up to 6 participants)
- scaled: RTP server-mediated communication (unlimited participants)

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ILocationClient.ListLocationsByParentAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ListLocationsByParentRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get child locations for a parent location
member.remarks:
Retrieve all locations that have the specified location as their parent.
Useful for getting all cities in a region, all buildings in a city, etc.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ILocationClient.ListRootLocationsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ListRootLocationsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get root locations in a realm
member.remarks:
Returns all top-level locations in a realm (locations with no parent).
These are typically regions or major areas within the realm.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ILocationClient.GetLocationAncestorsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.GetLocationAncestorsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get all ancestors of a location
member.remarks:
Returns the full ancestry chain from the specified location up to the
root location (parentLocationId=null). For example, for a specific building
might return [district, city, region].

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ILocationClient.GetLocationDescendantsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.GetLocationDescendantsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get all descendants of a location
member.remarks:
Returns all locations that are descendants of the specified location
(direct children, grandchildren, etc.). Useful for finding all places
within a region or city.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ILocationClient.SetLocationParentAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.SetLocationParentRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Set or change the parent of a location
member.remarks:
Update a location's parent, moving it in the hierarchy.
Validates that:
- New parent exists and is in the same realm
- No circular reference would be created
- Updates depth for location and all descendants

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ILocationClient.RemoveLocationParentAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.RemoveLocationParentRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Remove parent from a location (make it a root location)
member.remarks:
Remove the parent of a location, making it a top-level root location
within its realm. Updates depth for location and all descendants.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ILocationClient.DeleteLocationAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.DeleteLocationRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Delete location
member.remarks:
Hard delete a location. This will fail if the location:
- Has child locations (must delete or reparent children first)
- Is still referenced by other entities
For safe removal, first deprecate the location, remove all children,
then delete.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ILocationClient.DeprecateLocationAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.DeprecateLocationRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Deprecate a location
member.remarks:
Soft-delete a location by marking it as deprecated.
Deprecated locations:
- Remain queryable for historical data
- Cannot be used for placing new entities
- Can be hard-deleted after all references are removed

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ILocationClient.UndeprecateLocationAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.UndeprecateLocationRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Restore a deprecated location
member.remarks:
Remove the deprecated status from a location, making it
available for entity placement again.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ILocationClient.LocationExistsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.LocationExistsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Check if location exists and is active
member.remarks:
Fast validation endpoint for other services to check location validity.
Returns true if location exists and is not deprecated, false otherwise.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ILocationClient.SeedLocationsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.SeedLocationsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Seed locations from configuration
member.remarks:
Idempotent operation to seed locations from provided data.
Creates locations that don't exist, optionally updates existing locations.
Processes locations in dependency order (parents before children).
Typically called at service startup with YAML-defined location hierarchies.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Species.ISpeciesClient.DeleteSpeciesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Species.DeleteSpeciesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Delete species
member.remarks:
Hard delete a species. This will fail if the species is still in use.
For safe removal, first deprecate the species, then merge it into another species
(or VOID), then delete. Only deprecated species with zero references can be deleted.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Species.ISpeciesClient.DeprecateSpeciesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Species.DeprecateSpeciesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Deprecate a species
member.remarks:
Soft-delete a species by marking it as deprecated.
Deprecated species:
- Remain queryable for historical data
- Cannot be used for creating new characters
- Can be merged into other species using the merge endpoint
- Can be hard-deleted after all references are removed

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Species.ISpeciesClient.UndeprecateSpeciesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Species.UndeprecateSpeciesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Restore a deprecated species
member.remarks:
Remove the deprecated status from a species, making it
available for new characters again.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Species.ISpeciesClient.MergeSpeciesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Species.MergeSpeciesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Merge a deprecated species into another species
member.remarks:
Migrate all characters using a deprecated species to a target species.
This is the recommended way to handle species removal:
1. Deprecate the source species
2. Merge into the target species (or VOID for effective deletion)
3. Optionally hard-delete the now-empty deprecated species
The merge operation:
- Updates all characters using sourceSpeciesId to use targetSpeciesId
- Publishes events for each affected character
- Returns count of migrated characters
- Fails if source is not deprecated (safety check)

member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Add species to a realm
member.remarks: Make a species available in an additional realm

member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Remove species from a realm
member.remarks: Remove a species from a realm (species must not have characters in that realm)

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Species.ISpeciesClient.SeedSpeciesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Species.SeedSpeciesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Seed species from configuration
member.remarks:
Idempotent operation to seed species from provided data.
Creates species that don't exist, optionally updates existing species.
Typically called at service startup with YAML-defined species.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Realm.IRealmClient.DeleteRealmAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Realm.DeleteRealmRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Delete realm
member.remarks:
Hard delete a realm. This will fail if the realm is still in use.
For safe removal, first deprecate the realm, then delete after all
references are removed. Only deprecated realms with zero references
can be deleted.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Realm.IRealmClient.DeprecateRealmAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Realm.DeprecateRealmRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Deprecate a realm
member.remarks:
Soft-delete a realm by marking it as deprecated.
Deprecated realms:
- Remain queryable for historical data
- Cannot be used for creating new entities (characters, locations, etc.)
- Can be hard-deleted after all references are removed

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Realm.IRealmClient.UndeprecateRealmAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Realm.UndeprecateRealmRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Restore a deprecated realm
member.remarks:
Remove the deprecated status from a realm, making it
available for new entities again.

member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Check if realm exists and is active
member.remarks:

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.BehaviorEvaluatorBase
member.summary: Abstract base class for behavior evaluators providing common merge logic. Game extends this with entity system specifics.

remarks.para: This base class handles: - Model cache management - Intent merging for all 4 model types - Output buffer allocation
Game-specific implementation provides: - Which models are active per character - How to get character-specific variant preferences - How to populate the shared input state

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.BehaviorEvaluatorBase.ModelCache
member.summary: The model cache for interpreter lookup.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.BehaviorEvaluatorBase.Merger
member.summary: The intent merger for combining outputs.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.BehaviorEvaluatorBase._outputBuffer
member.summary: Pre-allocated output buffer to avoid per-frame allocation. Size is 15 slots: 5 channels * 2 slots + 5 extra slots for targets/positions.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.BehaviorEvaluatorBase.#ctor(BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.BehaviorModelCache)
member.summary: Creates a new behavior evaluator with the specified cache.
member.param: The model cache to use.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.BehaviorEvaluatorBase.EvaluateModelType(System.Guid,BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorModelType,System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Double})
member.summary: Evaluates a single model type for a character.
member.param: Unique identifier for the character.
The behavior model type to evaluate.
Current game state as input values.
member.returns: The behavior output, or null if the model is not active.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.BehaviorEvaluatorBase.IsModelActive(System.Guid,BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorModelType)
member.summary: Determines if a behavior model type is active for a character.
member.param: Unique identifier for the character.
The behavior model type to check.
member.returns: True if the model should be evaluated, false to skip.

remarks.para: Override this to implement game-specific activation logic. For example: - Combat model only active when in combat - Interaction model only active near interactable objects - Idle model always active but with low urgency
Default implementation returns true for all model types.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.BehaviorEvaluatorBase.GetPreferredVariant(System.Guid,BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorModelType)
member.summary: Gets the preferred variant for a character/type combination.
member.param: Unique identifier for the character.
The behavior model type.
member.returns: Variant name, or null for default.

remarks.para: Override this to implement game-specific variant selection. For example: - Combat variant based on equipped weapon type - Movement variant based on mount state - Interaction variant based on character class
Default implementation returns null (uses default variant).

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.BehaviorModelCache
member.summary: Caches behavior model interpreters per (character, type, variant) combination. Supports fallback chains for variant selection.

remarks.para: Models are registered by type and variant name (e.g., "sword-and-shield" combat). When requesting an interpreter, the cache checks the fallback chain to find the best available variant.
Example fallback chain for combat: ["sword-and-shield", "one-handed", "default"] If character requests "sword-and-shield" and it's not registered, falls back to "one-handed", then "default".
Thread-safety: The cache uses ConcurrentDictionary for thread-safe access. Individual interpreter instances are NOT thread-safe - each character should have its own interpreter.

member.summary: Default variant name used when no variant is specified.

When GetInterpreter is called with variant "sword-and-shield" but it's not registered, the cache will try "one-handed", then "default".

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.IBehaviorEvaluator
member.summary: Interface for evaluating behavior models per character. Game implements this to integrate with its entity/component system.

remarks.para: The SDK provides IntentMerger and BehaviorEvaluatorBase, but the game is responsible for: - Managing which models are active per character - Providing the shared input state (game state) - Applying the MergedIntent to animations/physics - Calling EvaluateCharacter each frame

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.IBehaviorEvaluator.EvaluateCharacter(System.Guid,System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Double})
member.summary: Evaluates all active behavior models for a character and returns the merged intent.
member.param: Unique identifier for the character.
Current game state as input values.
member.returns: Merged intent from all active behavior models.

remarks.para: The sharedInputState contains values like: - Character health, stamina, position - Nearby enemy positions and states - Current equipped items - Environment conditions
All 4 model types (combat, movement, interaction, idle) are evaluated if active, then merged using urgency-based resolution.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.IBehaviorEvaluator.InvalidateModel(System.Guid,BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorModelType)
member.summary: Invalidates a cached model when it needs to be reloaded.
member.param: Unique identifier for the character.
The behavior model type to invalidate.

remarks.para: Call this when: - Character equips new weapon (combat model may change) - Character's class changes (all models may change) - Model is hot-reloaded during development

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.IBehaviorEvaluator.InvalidateAllModels(System.Guid)
member.summary: Invalidates all cached models for a character.
member.param: Unique identifier for the character.
member.remarks: Call this when a character is respawned or their configuration changes significantly.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Intent.AttentionIntent
member.summary: Attention intent with blendable gaze targets.

remarks.para: Unlike simple exclusive channels, attention supports "blending" by providing multiple targets with weights. The game's animation system can then interpolate gaze direction between targets based on their weights.

Since entity IDs (Guids) cannot be mathematically blended, this struct provides primary and secondary targets with urgency-derived weights. The game resolves entity positions and performs actual gaze interpolation.
Example: Combat model wants to watch the threat (urgency 0.8), Movement model wants to look at the path ahead (urgency 0.4). Game blends gaze 67% toward threat, 33% toward path.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Intent.AttentionIntent.PrimaryTarget
member.summary: Primary attention target entity (highest urgency contributor). Null if no attention targets.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Intent.AttentionIntent.PrimaryUrgency
member.summary: Urgency of the primary attention target [0.0 - 1.0].

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Intent.AttentionIntent.SecondaryTarget
member.summary: Secondary attention target entity (second-highest urgency contributor). Null if only one model contributed attention.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Intent.AttentionIntent.SecondaryUrgency
member.summary: Urgency of the secondary attention target [0.0 - 1.0].

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Intent.AttentionIntent.BlendWeight
member.summary: Blend weight for primary target [0.0 - 1.0]. The game should blend gaze: BlendWeight toward primary, (1-BlendWeight) toward secondary. If no secondary target, this will be 1.0.
member.remarks: Calculated as: PrimaryUrgency / (PrimaryUrgency + SecondaryUrgency)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Intent.AttentionIntent.TotalUrgency
member.summary: Combined urgency for animation transition speed.

member.summary: Whether this intent has a valid attention target.

member.summary: Whether this intent has multiple targets to blend between.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorOutput
member.summary: Structured output from a single behavior model evaluation. Extracted from raw output buffer based on IntentSlotLayout conventions.

remarks.para: Each behavior model (combat, movement, interaction, idle) produces one BehaviorOutput. The IntentMerger combines these into a single MergedIntent.

Output extraction uses the standardized slot layout: - Slots 0-1: Action intent + urgency - Slots 2-3: Locomotion intent + urgency - Slots 4-5: Attention target + urgency - Slots 6-7: Stance intent + urgency - Slots 8-9: Vocalization intent + urgency - Slots 10-12: Locomotion target Vector3 (optional) - Slot 13: Action target entity ID (optional) - Slot 14: Attention target entity ID (optional)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorOutput.ActionIntent

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorModelType
member.summary: The fixed set of behavior model types for multi-model coordination. Each character can have up to 4 simultaneously-active behavior models.

remarks.para: These are intentionally fixed (not configurable) for simplicity. The IntentMerger knows how to blend outputs from these 4 model types.

Mapping to IntentChannels: - Any model can emit to any channel - Combat typically emits to Action, Stance - Movement emits to Locomotion - Interaction emits to Action, Attention - Idle emits to all channels with low urgency

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorModelType.Combat
member.summary: Attack, defend, combo management.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorModelType.Movement
member.summary: Navigation, pathfinding, steering.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorModelType.Interaction
member.summary: Item use, dialogue, environment interaction.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorModelType.Idle
member.summary: Ambient behavior, waiting, breathing.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Intent.IntentSlotLayout
member.summary: Output slot layout convention for EmitIntent opcode. Each intent channel uses 2 consecutive output slots: [action_index, urgency].

remarks.para:
Output buffer layout (10 slots minimum):
[0] Action intent (string table index) [1] Action urgency (0.0 - 1.0) [2] Locomotion intent (string table index) [3] Locomotion urgency (0.0 - 1.0) [4] Attention target (entity ID or 0) [5] Attention urgency (0.0 - 1.0) [6] Stance intent (string table index) [7] Stance urgency (0.0 - 1.0) [8] Vocalization intent (string table index) [9] Vocalization urgency (0.0 - 1.0)
Extended slots (10+) can be used for: - Locomotion target position (Vector3: slots 10-12) - Action target entity (slot 13) - Additional channel-specific data

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Intent.IntentSlotLayout.SlotsPerChannel
member.summary: Number of output slots per intent channel (intent + urgency).

member.summary: Total number of channels (Action, Locomotion, Attention, Stance, Vocalization).

member.summary: Minimum required output buffer size for all intent channels.

member.summary: Slot index for locomotion target X coordinate.

member.summary: Slot index for locomotion target Y coordinate.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Intent.IntentMerger
member.summary: Merges behavior outputs from multiple models using urgency-based resolution.

remarks.para: Each character can have up to 4 simultaneously-active behavior models. The IntentMerger resolves which model's output wins for each channel.

Resolution strategies: - Exclusive channels (Action, Stance, Vocalization): Highest urgency wins - Blendable channels (Locomotion): Weighted blend by urgency - Attention: Blendable (outputs primary/secondary targets with weights for gaze interpolation)
Zero-urgency outputs are ignored (model didn't emit for that channel).

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Intent.IntentMerger.UrgencyThreshold
member.summary: Minimum urgency threshold. Outputs below this are treated as zero.
Merge outputs from all active behavior models into a single MergedIntent.
member.param: Output from combat behavior model (may be null).
Output from movement behavior model (may be null).
Output from interaction behavior model (may be null).
Output from idle behavior model (may be null).
member.returns: Merged intent for game engine consumption.

member.summary: Blends attention from all contributors, outputting primary and secondary targets with weights.
member.remarks: Entity IDs (Guids) cannot be mathematically blended, so we output the top two contributors with their urgency-derived weights. The game resolves entity positions and performs actual gaze interpolation.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Intent.LocomotionIntent
member.summary: Locomotion intent with blendable target position.

remarks.para: Unlike other intent channels which are exclusive (highest urgency wins), locomotion can blend multiple contributors weighted by urgency.
Example: Combat model wants to strafe left (urgency 0.8), Movement model wants to walk forward (urgency 0.4). Result: diagonal movement weighted toward strafing.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Intent.MergedIntent
member.summary: The merged result of all behavior model outputs. This is what the game engine acts on each frame.

remarks.para: MergedIntent represents the final decision after the IntentMerger resolves conflicts between multiple simultaneously-active behavior models.

Resolution rules: - Action: Exclusive (highest urgency wins) - Locomotion: Blendable (targets weighted by urgency) - Attention: Blendable (multiple targets with weights for gaze interpolation) - Stance: Exclusive (highest urgency wins) - Vocalization: Exclusive (highest urgency wins)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Intent.MergedIntent.Action
member.summary: Winning action intent from highest-urgency contributor. Null if no model emitted an action.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Intent.MergedIntent.ActionTarget
member.summary: Target entity for the winning action. Null if the action doesn't require a target.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Intent.MergedIntent.ActionUrgency
member.summary: Urgency of the winning action [0.0 - 1.0]. Useful for animation blending speed.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Intent.MergedIntent.Locomotion
member.summary: Blended locomotion intent from all contributors.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Intent.MergedIntent.Attention
member.summary: Blended attention intent from all contributors. Contains primary and secondary targets with weights for gaze interpolation.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Intent.MergedIntent.Stance
member.summary: Winning stance intent from highest-urgency contributor. Null if no model emitted a stance.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Intent.MergedIntent.StanceUrgency
member.summary: Urgency of the winning stance [0.0 - 1.0].

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Intent.MergedIntent.Vocalization
member.summary: Winning vocalization intent from highest-urgency contributor. Null if no model emitted a vocalization.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Intent.MergedIntent.VocalizationUrgency
member.summary: Urgency of the winning vocalization [0.0 - 1.0].

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Intent.MergedIntent.Trace
member.summary: Debug trace showing which model contributed to each channel. Only available in DEBUG builds.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Intent.MergedIntent.Empty
member.summary: Empty merged intent (no actions, no movement).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Intent.MergedIntent.HasAnyIntent
member.summary: Whether this intent has any actionable content.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorModel
member.summary: A compiled behavior model ready for execution. Contains bytecode, state schema, constant pool, string table, and optional debug info.

remarks.para: Binary format: - Header (32 bytes) - Extension header (24 bytes, optional) - State schema (variable) - Continuation points table (variable, optional) - Constant pool (variable) - String table (variable) - Bytecode (variable) - Debug info (variable, optional)

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorModelInterpreter
member.summary: Lightweight interpreter for compiled ABML behavior models. Designed for per-frame evaluation with zero allocations after initialization.

remarks.para: This interpreter uses a stack-based architecture for simplicity and cache efficiency. All values are stored as doubles to avoid boxing and enable SIMD-friendly operations.
The interpreter is NOT thread-safe. Each character should have its own interpreter instance.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorModelInterpreter.Model
member.summary: The model being interpreted.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorModelInterpreter.ModelId
member.summary: Model ID for identification.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorModelInterpreter.InputSchema
member.summary: Input schema for this model.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorModelInterpreter.StringTable
member.summary: String table for output string lookup.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorModelInterpreter.#ctor(BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorModel)
member.summary: Creates an interpreter for the given behavior model.
member.param: The compiled behavior model to interpret.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorModelInterpreter.SetRandomSeed(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the random seed for deterministic execution. Call before Evaluate() for reproducible results.
member.param: Random seed (e.g., frame number for replays).

member.summary: Evaluates the behavior model with the given input state. Returns the output state (action intent).
member.remarks: This method is allocation-free after initial setup.
member.param: Current game state values (must match input schema).
Pre-allocated output buffer (must match output schema).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorModelInterpreter.ReadUInt16
member.summary: Reads a 16-bit unsigned integer from bytecode (little-endian).

member.summary: Gets the current stack depth (for debugging).

member.summary: Gets the current instruction pointer (for debugging).

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode
member.summary: Stack-based bytecode opcodes for behavior model execution. Different from the register-based expression opcodes in bannou-service.
member.remarks:
Instruction encoding: [Opcode:8][Operand1:8][Operand2:8][Operand3:8] Most instructions are 1-2 bytes. Jump targets use 16-bit offsets.
SYNC WARNING: Opcode values must match server-side definitions exactly.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.PushConst
member.summary: Push constant from pool. [PUSH_CONST idx:8]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.PushInput
member.summary: Push input variable value. [PUSH_INPUT idx:8]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.PushLocal
member.summary: Push local variable value. [PUSH_LOCAL idx:8]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.StoreLocal
member.summary: Pop and store to local variable. [STORE_LOCAL idx:8]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Pop
member.summary: Discard top of stack. [POP]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Dup
member.summary: Duplicate top of stack. [DUP]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Swap
member.summary: Swap top two stack values. [SWAP]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.PushString
member.summary: Push string from string table. [PUSH_STRING idx:16]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Add
member.summary: Pop a, b; push a + b. [ADD]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Sub
member.summary: Pop a, b; push a - b. [SUB]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Mul
member.summary: Pop a, b; push a * b. [MUL]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Div
member.summary: Pop a, b; push a / b. [DIV]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Mod
member.summary: Pop a, b; push a % b. [MOD]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Neg
member.summary: Pop a; push -a. [NEG]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Eq
member.summary: Pop a, b; push 1.0 if a == b, else 0.0. [EQ]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Ne
member.summary: Pop a, b; push 1.0 if a != b, else 0.0. [NE]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Lt
member.summary: Pop a, b; push 1.0 if a < b, else 0.0. [LT]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Le
member.summary: Pop a, b; push 1.0 if a <= b, else 0.0. [LE]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Gt
member.summary: Pop a, b; push 1.0 if a > b, else 0.0. [GT]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Ge
member.summary: Pop a, b; push 1.0 if a >= b, else 0.0. [GE]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.And
member.summary: Pop a, b; push 1.0 if both truthy, else 0.0. [AND]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Or
member.summary: Pop a, b; push 1.0 if either truthy, else 0.0. [OR]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Not
member.summary: Pop a; push 1.0 if falsy, else 0.0. [NOT]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Jmp
member.summary: Unconditional jump. [JMP offset:16]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.JmpIf
member.summary: Jump if top of stack is truthy. [JMP_IF offset:16]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.JmpUnless
member.summary: Jump if top of stack is falsy. [JMP_UNLESS offset:16]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Call
member.summary: Call subroutine. [CALL flow_idx:16]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Ret
member.summary: Return from subroutine. [RET]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Halt
member.summary: Stop execution. [HALT]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.SwitchJmp
member.summary: Jump table for switch-like constructs. [SWITCH_JMP cases:8]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.SetOutput
member.summary: Pop value and store in output variable. [SET_OUTPUT idx:8]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.EmitIntent
member.summary: Emit action intent with urgency. [EMIT_INTENT channel:8] Expects stack: [action_string_idx, urgency]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Rand
member.summary: Push random float [0, 1). [RAND]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.RandInt
member.summary: Push random int in range. [RAND_INT] Stack: [min, max]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Lerp
member.summary: Linear interpolation. [LERP] Stack: [a, b, t] -> a + (b - a) * t

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Clamp
member.summary: Clamp value to range. [CLAMP] Stack: [value, min, max]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Abs
member.summary: Absolute value. [ABS] Stack: [a] -> |a|

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Floor
member.summary: Floor. [FLOOR] Stack: [a] -> floor(a)

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Ceil
member.summary: Ceiling. [CEIL] Stack: [a] -> ceil(a)

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Min
member.summary: Minimum of two values. [MIN] Stack: [a, b]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Max
member.summary: Maximum of two values. [MAX] Stack: [a, b]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.ContinuationPoint
member.summary: Pause for possible extension attachment. [CONTINUATION_POINT cp_idx:16] Interpreter checks for attached extension at this point. If extension available: transfers control to extension flow. If no extension and timeout expires: jumps to default flow.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.ExtensionAvailable
member.summary: Check if extension is available. [EXTENSION_AVAILABLE cp_idx:16] Push 1.0 if extension attached, 0.0 otherwise.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.YieldToExtension
member.summary: Transfer control to attached extension. [YIELD_TO_EXTENSION cp_idx:16] Used internally when extension is attached.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Breakpoint
member.summary: Debug breakpoint. [BREAKPOINT]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Trace
member.summary: Debug trace with string. [TRACE str_idx:16]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Nop
member.summary: No-operation. [NOP]

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.ContinuationPoint
member.summary: Defines a point in execution where the interpreter pauses for possible extension attachment. Used for streaming composition in cinematics (THE_DREAM pattern).

remarks.para: Continuation points enable runtime extension of executing behaviors. A game server receives a complete, executable cinematic, starts executing immediately, and can optionally receive extensions that attach to named points.

Execution flow: 1. Interpreter reaches CONTINUATION_POINT opcode 2. Checks if extension is attached at this point 3. If extension available: transfers control to extension 4. If no extension: waits up to timeout, then executes default flow

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.ContinuationPoint.NameHash
member.summary: FNV-1a hash of the continuation point name for fast lookup.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.ContinuationPoint.NameStringIndex
member.summary: Index into string table for continuation point name (for debugging).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.ContinuationPoint.TimeoutMs
member.summary: Maximum time to wait for extension attachment (milliseconds). If 0, no wait - immediately use default if no extension.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.ContinuationPoint.DefaultFlowOffset
member.summary: Bytecode offset of the default flow to execute if no extension arrives.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.Behavior.Runtime.ContinuationPoint.BytecodeOffset
member.summary: Bytecode offset where the CONTINUATION_POINT opcode is located.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.ResponseCodes
member.summary: Response codes used in the binary WebSocket protocol for success/error indication. These codes are returned in the response header's ResponseCode field.
member.remarks: Codes 0-49 are protocol-level errors (Connect service). Codes 50-69 are service-level errors (downstream service responses). Codes 70+ are shortcut-specific errors.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.ResponseCodes.OK
member.summary: Request completed successfully.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.ResponseCodes.RequestError

member.summary: Request payload exceeds maximum allowed size.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.ResponseCodes.TooManyRequests
member.summary: Rate limit exceeded for this client/session.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.ResponseCodes.InvalidRequestChannel
member.summary: Invalid channel number in request header.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.ResponseCodes.Unauthorized
member.summary: Authentication required but not provided or invalid.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.ResponseCodes.ServiceNotFound
member.summary: Target service GUID not found in capability manifest.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.ResponseCodes.ClientNotFound
member.summary: Target client GUID not found (for client-to-client messages).

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.ResponseCodes.MessageNotFound
member.summary: Referenced message ID not found.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.ResponseCodes.Service_BadRequest
member.summary: Service returned 400 Bad Request.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.ResponseCodes.Service_NotFound
member.summary: Service returned 404 Not Found.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.ResponseCodes.Service_Unauthorized

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.SDK.ResponseCodes.Service_Conflict
